content:
Prev: Outer Bay Tank (Motion Effect) Up: Monterey Bay Aquarium, June 28, 2001 Next: Nautilis (Reflection Effect)

Octopus



This enormous red octopus was putting on a show for us, moving all around the tank.
Unfortunately the low lighting and his speed made it difficult to capture him on-camera...
this was the best of a half-dozen shots.
Taken Thursday, June 28, 2001, 02:23:36pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 937kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/2s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 38mm
